decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Received 13/10/2014: 4866(P)010, 4866(P)200, 1311-PL03, Environmental Acoustic Test (KR04059 1.2) 10th October 2014 and Received 25/11/2014: 4866(P)205-B, 4866(P)100-01-B) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The level of noise emitted from any commercial plant installed at the premises shall not be less than 10dB(A) below the existing background noise levels (LAeq), when measured from the nearest noise sensitive receptor, over any 24 hour period in accordance with the guidance set out by BS4142.1997.
description: Installation of a two fan condenser and three air conditioning units on the roof
